entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 2:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
